mil7.3.5:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.3.5:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā bahuvidhadārusaṅghāṭasamavāyena bahumpi janaṃ tārayati;
mil7.3.5:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭivattabahuvidhadhammasaṅghāṭasamavāyena sadevako loko tārayitabbo.
mil7.3.5:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.5:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bahuvidhakilesaūmivegaṃ lābhasakkārayasasilokapūjanavandanā parakulesu nindāpasaṃsāsukhadukkhasammānanavimānanabahuvidhadosaūmivegañca sahitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.5:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.5:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, nāvā aparimitamanantamapāramakkhobhitagambhīre mahatimahāghose timitimiṅgalamakaramacchagaṇākule mahatimahāsamudde carati;
mil7.3.5:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena tiparivaṭṭadvādasākāracatusaccābhisamayappaṭivedhe mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.5:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.5:3.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare saccasaṃyutte—
mil7.3.5:4.1: ‘Vitakkentā ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, “idaṃ dukkhan”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti vitakkeyyāthā’”ti.
